directory.name: components
directory.purpose: This directory, `src\components`, houses the source code for all the individual UI components of a todo application, including input, item display, filtering, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: TodoApp
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoApp` directory contains the source code for the components of a Todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoFilters
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components\TodoFilters`, stores the source code for the "TodoFilters" components used in a larger application.

subdirectories.name: TodoInput
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoInput` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for user input within a todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoItem
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoItem` directory contains the source code for the components related to individual todo items within a larger application.

subdirectories.name: TodoList
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoList` directory in `.\src\components` contains the source code for a "TodoList" component within a larger software project.

subdirectories.name: TodoStats
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoStats` directory contains the source code for the components related to displaying statistics for a to-do list application.
